title: Future with AI: Adapt Faster or Be Left Behind
takeaways: AI is a structural shift, not a tool upgrade.
Individuals who redesign workflows with AI will lead.
Agents will become a mainstream interface layer.

title: Building AI-Native Product Habits
takeaways: Measure learning velocity, not just output velocity.

title: From XR to Agents: The Next Interface Wave
takeaways: Interface shifts usually begin as workflow shifts.
Agentic software changes who does what, not only how.
